org.apache.river.api.security

Class PermissionGrantBuilderImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.api.security.PermissionGrantBuilder
      • org.apache.river.api.security.PermissionGrantBuilderImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    class PermissionGrantBuilderImp
extends PermissionGrantBuilder
implements Serializable
    PermissionGrantBuilderImp represents the serialized form of all PermissionGrant implementations in this package. All implementations of PermissionGrant are immutable with final fields. PermissinGrantBuilderImp ensures the correct PermissionGrant implementation is returned, this reduces the
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Peter Firmstone

      • clazz

        public PermissionGrantBuilder clazz(Class cl)
        Description copied from class: PermissionGrantBuilder
        Extracts ProtectionDomain from the Class for use in the PermissionGrantBuilder. The ClassLoader and ProtectionDomain are weakly referenced, when collected any created PermissionGrant affected will be voided.
        Specified by:
        clazz in class PermissionGrantBuilder
        Parameters:
        cl - Class used to determine the ProtectionDomain to be used for PermissionGrant.
        Returns:
        PermissionGrantBuilder.
